thread.title: Washington, Edward

title: Washington, Edward
text:
Mr. Edward Washington
(February 1, 1932- December 19, 2023)
It is with deepest sympathy Godfrey Funeral Home announces Mr. Edward Washington, age 91, departed this life Tuesday, December 19, 2023.
The Celebration of Life for the late Mr. Edward Washington, will be Saturday, December 30, 2023, 2:00 p.m., at Godfrey Funeral Home, 636 River Street, Valdosta, GA, 31601.
Pastor Kenneth Emanuel will be officiating.
Interment will follow in the Riverview Memorial Gardens, 3945 N. Valdosta Rd., Valdosta, GA.
Public viewing will be Friday, December 29, 2023, from 10:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. at Godfrey Funeral Home, Valdosta, GA.
All those who wish to pay their respect in person must wear mask at the public viewing and at the funeral service.
Sympathy may be expressed by signing the online registry at www.godfreyfuneralhome.net.
Professional services provided by Godfrey Funeral Home, LLC.
Due to COVID-19, Godfrey Funeral Home will be enforcing social distancing and following the Center for Disease Control (CDC) guidelines.
In Memory of EdwardWhen EdwardHow
